page.title: 15HOW WE AMUSE OURSELVES
page.content: On Saturdays we do not go to school, but stay at home instead. Most of us like to watch the television in the morning and then go out to play. Some of us play in the garden or wait for mummy to take us to the park. Quite a lot of us like to play out in the street with our friends. Nearly all of us have got bikes, so we like to have races round the block. Sometimes we are allowed to go to the park by ourselves to play. But most of all we like to watch television in the morning. If our mums let us we think we might stay in front of the television instead of coming to school.
